name: Deserter Simulator
description: A soldier disillusioned with war wants out. Exhausted and not even able to walk... a motorcycle appears before him. His chance to be a deserter. To escape from the battlefield. To end the fight. To regain love and peace! Please enjoy this Japanese indie 3D motorcycle simulator game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Memory: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Memory: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: 'The Dev of this game deserves to become a deserter'
I had a ton of fun with it :D

The game doesn't work in my steam library so I had to open the exe file of the game, but the game is hilarious. I was smiling the entire time as I was playing, I'm not sure whether it was because the simplicity of the game or the weird positions my acrobatic character did. I enjoyed every second of this game.  pros: cheap price easy to learn controls hilarious music good for weak computers large map  Cons: have to launch the game from my steam files few spelling errors objective of the game is a little unclear  I really enjoyed the game now that I got to play it and I hope the developers will add more things to this game to improve the fun.
